author: cutting
msg: HADOOP-469.  Fix /bin/bash specifics that have crept into our /bin/sh scripts since HADOOP-352.  Contributed by Jean-Baptiste Quenot.

author: sichen
msg: Turned off transactions for webtools import services because the service transactions were setting timeouts to 60 seconds, regardless of what the import code was doing, at least with PostgreSQL

author: jmsnell
msg: Fix NPE's and remove attributes is value == null

author: jwaldman
msg: fix for ADFFACES-139 Under some circumstances, _spinboxRepeat will loop forever
(added onmouseout to do the same thing as onmouseup). This stops the loop.

author: djd
msg: DERBY-1609 Add IJRunScriptTest and _Suite JUnit tests for the testing of ij.runScript.
Modify runScript to take an OutputStream instead of a PrintStream, fix it to
correctly return the number of errors seen while running the script.
Add utility methods to BaseJDBCTestCase to run setup scripts from an InputStream or a String.
